import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import axios from "axios" import { Container, Card, Row, Col, Table, Button } from "react-bootstrap" import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux" import { singleWorkout } from '../actions/workoutActions' const WorkoutScreen = ({match}) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const workoutSingle = useSelector((state) => state.workoutSingle) const { loading, error, workout} = workoutSingle useEffect(() => { singleWorkout(match.params.id) }, [match]) return ( <> { workout ? ( <> {error &&
{error}
} {loading &&
{loading}
}

{workout.description}

On {`${workout.date.substring(8,10)}.${workout.date.substring(5,7)}, ${workout.date.substring(11,16)} `}

{`Price: ${workout.revenuePerClient} shekels`}
Duration: { workout.duration > 1 ? `${workout.duration} hours` : `${workout.duration} hour` }
Equipment: {workout.equipment}
Total Revenue: {workout.totalRevenue}
Current Clients Amount: {workout.currentClients}
Max Amount Of Clients: {workout.maxClients}

Clients

{workout.clients.map(client => )}
ID NAME EMAIL PHONE NUMBER
{client._id} {client.name} {client.email} {client.phoneNumber}
) : (
Not a valid workout
) } ) } export default WorkoutScreen
